pr_title: Added support to seal an append blob

timeline.message: Added logic to pass appendSeal to copy
Added sealed to getproperties and list blobs
Added code for seal append blob
Changed named of sealed to destinationSealed
Added append blob seal test records

timeline.bodyText: I think "sealDestination" makes more sense to me because it's something that will happen in the future whereas "destinationSealed" sounds like it's commenting on the past/current state. I'm not really sure what you would use for the getter, though, because "isSealDestination" doesn't really work. Also not sure if this was already resolved in .NET
timeline.author: rickle-msft

timeline.bodyText: Is there a Rest doc we can link to?
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: I couldnt find a REST doc for this
replies.author: gapra-msft

timeline.bodyText: Sorry to keep asking this, but it looks like we decided to allow null for options when they don't have a required value?
timeline.author: rickle-msft

replies.bodyText: yeah I noticed that we do allow null for options when they dont have a required value. Im gonna create a PR after this making them all have this functionality - just didnt want to have this PR do 2 things at once
replies.author: gapra-msft
